SELECT MEM_NO , PRO_NO , PRO_VIEWS , PRO_DATE , PRO_CATEGORY , PRO_LOCATION , PRO_NEG , PRO_PRICE , PRO_STATE , PRO_STATUS , PRO_TITLE , PRO_TYPE , PRO_CONTENT , PRO_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY PRO_DATE
ORDER BY PRO_VIEWS
ORDER BY PRO_PRICE
LIMIT 20;
